title: Update checklist with labeled checkboxes for Bias, OBS, LQS, and FVG

requirements.text: Update the pre-trade checklist in the AddTradeDialog component to display exactly four checkbox items with labels: 'Bias - Market direction', 'OBS - Order blocks', 'LQS - Liquidity sweeps', and 'FVG - Fair value gaps'

quotes:
✓ **Bias** - Market direction
✓ **OBS** - Order blocks
✓ **LQS** - Liquidity sweeps
✓ **FVG** - Fair value gaps

acceptanceCriteria: AddTradeDialog displays exactly four checklist items
Each item shows as a checkbox with a label combining the term and its description (e.g., 'Bias - Market direction')
Checklist items are in this order: Bias, OBS, LQS, FVG

requirements.text: Update the pre-trade checklist in the EditTradeDialog component to display exactly four checkbox items with labels: 'Bias - Market direction', 'OBS - Order blocks', 'LQS - Liquidity sweeps', and 'FVG - Fair value gaps'
acceptanceCriteria: EditTradeDialog displays exactly four checklist items matching AddTradeDialog
Each item shows as a checkbox with a label combining the term and its description
Existing trade checklist data is preserved and displayed correctly

requirements.text: Update the TradesList component to display the four checklist items (Bias, OBS, LQS, FVG) with their descriptive labels when showing trade details
acceptanceCriteria: Trade detail view shows checklist items with full labels (e.g., 'Bias - Market direction')
Checked and unchecked states are clearly visible
Display matches the order and labels used in the add/edit dialogs

constraints: Do not modify the backend schema or main.mo file
Preserve existing trade data and checklist state in the database
Maintain the checkbox functionality and state management that already exists
nonGoals: Adding new checklist items beyond the four specified
Changing the data structure of how checklist items are stored
Modifying other trade entry fields or functionality
